div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Endpoint` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Endpoint`. Element `Endpoint` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.status`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.connectionType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.connectionType`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.name` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.name`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.description` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Element `Endpoint.environmentType` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Element `Endpoint.managingOrganization` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.managingOrganization`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.contact` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.contact`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.period`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.payload` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Endpoint.payload.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Endpoint.payload.type` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.

Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`. Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.payloadMimeType`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`. Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.payloadMimeType`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.address` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.address`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.header` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.header`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
